Package io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.core.categories

Class FlexCategory

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.mrCookieSlime.Slimefun.Objects.Category
      • io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.core.categories.FlexCategory

  • public abstract class FlexCategory
extends Category
    A FlexCategory is a Category inside the SlimefunGuide that can be completely modified. It cannot hold any SlimefunItem but can be completely overridden to perform any action upon being opened.
    Author:
    TheBusyBiscuit

    • Method Detail

      • isVisible

        @ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
public abstract boolean isVisible​(org.bukkit.entity.Player p,
                                  PlayerProfile profile,
                                  SlimefunGuideMode layout)
        This method returns whether this FlexCategory is visible under the given context. Implementing this method gives full flexibility over who can see the Category when and where.
        Parameters:
        p - The Player who opened his SlimefunGuide
        profile - The PlayerProfile of the Player
        layout - The SlimefunGuideMode in which this FlexCategory is viewed
        Returns:
        Whether to display this FlexCategory

      • open

        public abstract void open​(org.bukkit.entity.Player p,
                          PlayerProfile profile,
                          SlimefunGuideMode layout)
        This method is called when a Player opens this FlexCategory. This is an abstract method which needs to be implemented in order to determine what this FlexCategory should actually do as it cannot hold any items.
        Parameters:
        p - The Player who wants to open this FlexCategory
        profile - The corresponding PlayerProfile for that Player
        layout - The current SlimefunGuideMode

      • isHidden

        public final boolean isHidden​(@Nonnull
                              org.bukkit.entity.Player p)
        Description copied from class: Category
        This method checks whether this Category will be hidden for the specified Player. Categories are hidden if all of their items have been disabled.
        Overrides:
        isHidden in class Category
        Parameters:
        p - The Player to check for
        Returns:
        Whether this Category will be hidden to the given Player
